from rest_framework import serializers
# Generated with django-test-tools version 1.9.7 on 2020-03-30 18:15:18 UTC


class PersonSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    Standard Serializer for the Person model.
    
    """
    class Meta:
        model = Person
        field = ('id', 'first_name', 'middle_name', 'last_name', 'sex', 'national_id', 'national_id_type', 'country_for_id', 'picture', 'date_of_birth', 'blood_type', 'religion', 'document', 'salary_currency', 'salary', 'cell_phone', )
